description: Perfect for birthdays and special events. Choose your flavor, filling, and frosting!

items.name: Classic Vanilla
items.details: Moist vanilla cake with vanilla whip frosting and assorted fruit.

items.name: Chocolate Indulgence
items.details: Rich chocolate cake with chocolate whip frosting and assorted fruit.

items.name: Pandan Delight
items.details: Fragrant pandan cake with vanilla whip frosting and assorted fruit.

items.name: Coconut Vanilla
items.details: Rich coconut cake with vanilla whip, toasted coconut flakes and assorted fruit.

items.name: Ube Cake
items.details: Moist ube cake with ube-flavored whip frosting and assorted fruit.
